entry.title: Combined summary - Proof-of-Loss -- Errata
entry.summary: A paper on block-chaining odds formula contained an error on page 5, which made the formula confusing. The mistake was in the text and assumed that the affected route was always rewarded, which is not true. A corrected version of the paper is now available at the same URL as before, but it requires clearing the browser's cache to download it. The updated file was released on 02/07/2017. The author requests feedback on the corrected version through email to avoid overloading the list with something not directly related to Bitcoin.
